tool_description: Validates and standardizes shipping addresses to ensure deliverability and reduce shipping errors.

street_address.description: Street address including number and street name

error_messages: Invalid address format: Ensure street address contains both number and street name.
Unrecognized city/state combination: Verify city exists in the specified state/province.
Invalid postal code: Postal code format does not match country standards.
Undeliverable address: Address cannot be validated against postal service records.
usage: Provide complete address components to receive standardized, validated address suitable for shipping labels.

is_valid.description: Whether the address is valid and deliverable

delivery_point.description: Additional delivery point information if available
